newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil may publish cellular decree Nov. 5 - ministry.
newsitem.headline: Brazil may publish cellular decree Nov. 5 - ministry.

text.p: A presidential decree authorizing the private sector to run cellular telephone services in Brazil will probably be published on Tuesday, a Communications Ministry spokesman said.

Details of the concessions to run the so-called Band B cellular serivces would be published the following day, after which the government will hold public hearings on the tender process "over a short period," the spokesman said.
News reports have said the government hopes to start the tender process by the end of November.
